id.description: The unique identifier of the transfer instrument.

legalEntityId.description: The unique identifier of the [legal entity](https://docs.adyen.com/api-explorer/#/legalentity/latest/post/legalEntities__resParam_id) that owns the transfer instrument.

type.description:
The type of transfer instrument.

Possible value: **bankAccount**.

accountNumber.description:
The bank account number (without separators).

 When this is provided, the `branchCode` is also required.

bankBicSwift.description: The bank's BIC or SWIFT code.

bankCity.description: The city where the bank is located.

bankCode.description: The bank code of the banking institution with which the bank account is registered.

bankName.description: The name of the banking institution where the bank account is held.

branchCode.description:
The branch code of the branch under which the bank account is registered.

Required when you provide an `accountNumber`.

 In the following countries, this value corresponds to:


* United States: routing number
* United Kingdom: sort code
* Germany: Bankleitzahl

checkCode.description: The check code of the bank account.

countryCode.description: The two-character [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) country code where the bank account is registered. For example, **NL**.

currencyCode.description: The account's three-character [ISO currency code](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/currency-codes). For example, **EUR**.

iban.description: The international bank account number as defined in the [ISO-13616](https://www.iso.org/standard/81090.html) standard.
